tool_description: Discover our translation API which allows you to translate any text into another language. With over 100 languages ​​available, our API gives you easy integration with your application and very fast translations.
name: Google translate v2
title: Google translate v2

api_list.name: Supported languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-translate-v21.p.rapidapi.com/support_language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-translate-v21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://google-translate-v21.p.rapidapi.com/support_language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-translate-v21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
